# Request for Proposal: Aqueous Ozonation System for Food Products Disinfection

**Notice Information**
- **Reference Number**: WS3762855648-doc3927096487
- **Posting Date**: March 28, 2023
- **Bid Closing Date and Time**: April 11, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3762855648

**Request Details**
The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) is seeking proposals for the acquisition of a laboratory unit of an aqueous ozonation system for food products. The system will be installed at the location in Saint-Hyacinthe, QC, Canada, as specified in Annex A.

**Key Information**
* **Scope of Work**: The successful supplier will provide the aqueous ozonation system and all related support documentation.
* **Delivery Location**: Saint-Hyacinthe, QC, Canada
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Applicable
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **-method of Procurement**: Competitive Open Bidding


**Contact Information**
For more information and access to the bid solicitation documents, please refer to the link provided below.

**Official Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15819347?extsite=MTU4MTkzNDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15819347?extsite=MTU4MTkzNDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Bid Submission Protocol**
- **Submission Deadline**: April 11, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Late Submissions**: Any bids received after the specified deadline will be declared non-responsive.

**Important Notes**

This bid solicitation replaces and cancels previous bid solicitation number 01B46-230552, dated December 22, 2022, with a closing date of January 31, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Debriefing or feedback sessions will be offered upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.
